channel.title: mooc on The Portal of Knowledge
channel.description: Recent content in mooc on The Portal of Knowledge

item.title: Moocing all around the world
item.description: I am always keen to learn new things and broaden my horizons. Therefore, I often attend free Massive Open Online Courses (MOOCs). At present, I have completed successfully more than 350 MOOCs (most of them with distinction).
